author: ryanleeschneider
content: We are seeing at least 3 different chains on Ropsten now, etherscan is on one chain while our nodes seem to be on a mix of two _other_ chains.  Anyone else seeing anything similar?  All our nodes are on 1.10.8 havent quite figured out why our nodes are on 2 different chains yet.

author: ryanleeschneider
content: Correction, our nodes weren't on 2 different chains, just some of them got stuck at an older block on the same chain.  FWIW etherscan seems to have reorged to the same chain as us now and so we're just trying to get our stuck nodes unstuck (lots of bad nodes on ropsten network so they are hitting lots of bad peers)
